name: Aftershock
desc: Your heavy weapon creates chaos with every swing.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a _Versatile_/_Heavy_ Blunt Weapon_.
effect: Make the Target's space _Veiled_. On a _Graze_-, inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Focus_).

name: Arcing Shot
desc: You fire your arrow high, giving a foe the chance to respond but increasing your range.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a Projectile Weapon_.
effect: Increase the Weapon's Range by 2. Instead of immediately resolving any Attack granted by the _Technique_, create a Size 1 _Hazard_ in the creature's space. Remove it at the start of the next _Phase_, after all 'A _Phase_ begins' Reactions (and similar) have resolved. Resolve the Technique when the _Hazard_ is removed.

name: Armored Blow
desc: You put the full weight of your armor behind a heavy strike.
reqs: Technique is a _Melee_ _Strike_.
effect: Gain _Fortify_ 1 until the end of the _Turn_. Before making your Attack, you may _Wager_ up to 3 _Grit_, contested by _Grit_/_Reflex_. If you win, deal additional Damage equal to your _Armor's_ _Guard_, add _Prone_, and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1, even on a _Miss_.
special:
Modify the Effect, depending on this Attack's Keywords:
* _Quick_: Inflict _Push_ 2 instead of _Prone_.
* _Strong_: Add _Push_ 1, and increase the cost to Negate by 1.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: On a _Graze_- use _Martial Arts_. You must use a _Body_ Weapon.
* 1 _Grit_: Instead, gain _Fortify_ 2.

name: Armored Charge
desc: You charge forward, trusting your armor to defend you.
reqs: Attached to a Technique with Movement.
effect: Gain _Fortify_ 1 until the end of your _Turn_.

name: Arterial Slash
desc: You send your blade towards a foes' arteries, seeking to cause massive hemorrhaging.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a _Blade_ Weapon and you are using _Bloodletter Style_.
effect: Decrease the _Damage_ by X (minimum 1, maximum 5). Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1, and increase the total _Bleed_ inflicted by X.

name: Bold Strike
desc: You make a heroic strike, sacrificing your guard to inspire allies.
reqs: Attached to a Melee Strike.
effect: Gain _Exposed_ 1. On a _Hit_, gain _Vigor_ 2 and gain _Courage_ 1 or grant an ally within Range 6 _Courage_ 1. On a _Crit_, instead gain _Vigor_ 4 and gain _Courage_ 2 or grant an ally within Range 6 _Courage_ 2.

name: Bounce Shot
desc: You ricochet your thrown weapons off a foe, sending it spiraling into another.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Thrown_ Weapon and you are using _Ricochet Style_.
effect: Increase the Range by 3 or choose an _Obstacle_ within Range. Attack a creature within Range 3 of that Obstacle, but the new trajectory may not pass through the Obstacle. Treat the Obstacle as the origin of the Attack when determining _Cover_.
special: For this _Turn_, _Ricochet Style_ instead allows you to place the Weapon anywhere within 5 spaces of the Target.
boost:
Choose one. Both Boosts may be repeated:
* 1 _Momentum_: For a single Attack, on a _Hit_+, repeat the Attack but add _Glancing_ against a creature with Range 3 of the original Target. If the original Attack was _Glancing_, this Attack is made at _Disadvantage_.
* 2 _Momentum_: As above, but remove _Glancing_ and take no penalties if the original Attack was _Glancing_.

name: Bull Rush
desc: You bowl through foes, leaving them sprawling in your wake.
reqs: Must be Attached to a Technique with Movement and you are using _Ox Stance_.
effect: During this Technique, if you move into a creature's space, deal 2 Crush Damage and knock them _Prone_ (1 _Grit_/_Reflex_). If they _Negate_, they take half Damage. You may also attempt to move through Obstacles; when you do, use _Martial Arts_ using a Body Weapon against the Obstacle. Add _Siege_. If you fail to destroy the _Obstacle_, end your _Shift_. Otherwise, continue your _Shift_.
boost: 1 _Grit_, taken when you fail to destroy an _Obstacle_: Increase the Damage by 3. This Boost is repeatable.

name: Careful Aim
desc: You take careful aim at a foe, exploiting all information you have on them.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a Projectile Weapon_.
effect: Increase the _Speed_ of the Technique by 1. Gain a +X Bonus to the Attack Roll, where X is half the creature's topmost _Knowledge_ Token. Remove the _Knowledge_ Token without gaining any Tokens after making this attack.
boost: 1 _Focus_: Instead X is the creature's topmost _Knowledge_ Token.

name: Catapult
desc: You send a boulder upward, creating a deadly explosion when it lands.
effect: You must target a _Boulder_ or _Large Boulder_. Range is instead 6 and, if you use the Obstacle's Interact, halve all Costs.
boost:
Choose one, and use it in place of one of the Obstacle's Interact:
* 3 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Must target a _Boulder_. Remove the _Boulder_, then create a Blast 1 Hazard within Range 8. At the end of the _Round_, remove the _Hazard_, place a _Boulder_ in the center of the Area, and Attack using the below Profile.
* 4 _Grit_/_Momentum_: As above, but instead target a _Large Boulder_ and create a _Hazard_ that is a Burst 1 around a Size 2 Obstacle, including the spaces that the Obstacle would occupy. Deal +2 Damage and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

Regardless, _Push_ any creature in the space the Obstacle is placed in so that it is not in an occupied space.

name: Circular Slash
desc: You send your blade towards a foes' arteries, seeking to cause massive hemorrhaging.
reqs: Technique is a Single-Target _Strike_ using a _Blade_ Weapon_.
effect: Instead, Attack in a _Burst_ 1.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Remove _Glancing_.

name: Close-Quarters Throw
desc: You throws do not compromise your defenses, allowing you to easily attack in close-quarters.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Thrown_ Weapon.
effect: Ignore all penalties due to adjacent foes for this Attack. On a _Miss_, you may inflict _Exposed_ 1 (1 _Focus_).

name: Concussive Smash
desc: Your attack slams down with titanic force, sending out shockwaves.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Melee Weapon.
effect: Repeat the Attack in a Burst 1 around the Target, exempting yourself, but add _Glancing_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Make two spaces adjacent to the Target _Rough_.

name: Courageous Charge
desc: You dash forward recklessly, inspiring your allies with your display.
reqs: Attached to a Technique with Movement.
effect: For your turn, enemies have _Advantage_ on all _Opportune_ _Punish_ Attacks against you, but gain _Impaired_ 1 (1 _Focus_) if they do not take a _Punish_ Reaction against you when they are able to. Whenever an enemy makes a _Punish_ Attack against you either gain _Courage_ 1 or grant an ally within Range 4 _Courage_ 1, your choice.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Gain _Guard_ 2 for this Movement.

name: Crashing Earth
desc: You sacrifice speed to imbue a strike with every ounce of the earth's power.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Weapon.
effect: This Technique's Movement is now _None_, and you may not Move with any of your other Techniques or use _Reactions_ this _Phase_. Do not resolve this Technique until the end of the current _Phase_ but, as a part of this _Technique_, you may _Wager_ up to 3 _Grit_. If you do not lose, you have _Advantage_ on the Attack.

name: Deadeye Shot
desc: You take careful aim, threading your shot through cover.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Projectile Weapon and you are using _Sniper Style_.
effect: Gain _Hobbled_ 1. If the Target is at a lower _Elevation_, deal +2 Damage and add _Arcing_.

name: Debilitating Throw
desc: Your thrown weapons have a habit of sticking, making things difficult for foes.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Thrown_ Weapon and you are using _Pinpoint Style_.
effect: If this Strike _Embeds_, while the Target has _Embed_, inflict your choice of _Impaired_/_Exposed_ 1 (1 _Grit_) at the start of each of their _Turns_.

name: Disarming Throw
desc: You target a foe's weapon or equipment, attempting to remove it.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a _Thrown_ Weapon_.
effect: Resolve a single Attack with a _Thrown_ Weapon twice: once, adding _Glancing_, against the creature, and once, adding _Sundering_, against a piece of _Equipment_ the creature has _Equipped_. If both attacks are a _Hit_+, inflict _Exposed_/_Impaired_ 1 (1 _Focus_).
special: If the Target has no _Equipment_, instead add _Impaired_ 1 to the Attack.

name: Disruptive Bash
desc: Attacks with your shield leave foes reeling, limiting their ability to respond.
reqs: Must be Attached to a Strike using a Shield Weapon.
effect: On a _Graze_+, increase _Impaired_ inflicted by 1. You may exchange any Value of _Impaired_ you would inflict for _Dazed_ or _Vulnerable_ and instead inflict that _Affliction_. For example, you may, instead of inflicting _Impaired_ 3, inflict _Dazed_ 1, _Vulnerable_ 1, and _Impaired_ 1.

name: Driving Strikes
desc: Your blunt weapons forces foes back, keeping them off guard.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Blunt_ Weapon and you are using _Bully Style_.
effect: Add _Push_ 1 on a _Graze_+, or _Push_ 2 on a _Hit_+. You may reduce the final _Push_ of the Attack by 4 to instead inflict _Prone_.

name: Earth Leap
desc: You are skilled at controlling earth, flinging it about with ease.
reqs: Technique has Movement.
effect: Create an Earth Platform in your space. Immediately make a single Jump, increasing your Jump value by 2 for this Jump.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_: Make all spaces adjacent to where you end your Jump _Rough_/_Veiled_.
* 1 _Grit_: Instead, create an _Earth Pillar_. Increase your Jump value by 3 instead.

name: Earthbend
desc: You are skilled at controlling earth, flinging it about with ease.
effect: You must target an _Earthen_ Obstacle. Range is instead 6 and, if you use the Obstacle's Interact Action, halve all Costs.
special: Instead of using _Obstacles_ _Interact_, you may  Move the Obstacle up to 5 spaces in any direction. If you move it into a creature stop this Movement, but inflict _Dazed_ 1, _Push_ 2 (2 Grit/Reflex) and deal X Crush Damage, where X is the Speed of this Technique. The creature takes half Damage if they _Negate_.
boost:
Choose any, and use it in place of one of the Obstacle's Interacts:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: You may instead target a Size 2 Obstacle or 3 Size 1 Obstacles, resolving the effect independently for each.
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: You may Move the Obstacle and use its Interact.

name: Earthquake Step
desc: As you strike you send an earthquake to disrupt a foe's footing, limiting their ability to dodge.
effect: Once this _Turn_, inflict _Exposed_ 2 (1 _Reflex_) on a creature within Range 4 and on _Earthen_ Terrain.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. If you _Attack_ that creature this _Turn_, add _Sure Hit_ 1.

name: Exploiting Strike
desc: You find an old wound in an enemy with your seismic sense before exploiting it with a powerful attack.
reqs: Attached to a Single-Target Strike.
effect: On a _Hit_+ add _Impaired_ 1 to the Attack and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
special: If you _Attack_ a foe within your _Seismic Sense_ and clear a _Knowledge_ Token as a part of this Attack, deal additional Damage equal to Value of _Knowledge_ cleared.

name: Flurry of Blows
desc: You punctuate an unarmed strike with another unarmed strike.
reqs: Technique allows making an Attack with an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: Replace a single non-_Glancing_ Attack with an _Unarmed_ Weapon with two _Glancing_ Attacks using the same Weapon.

name: Fortifying Stone
desc: You tear stone away as you run, hastily constructing armor.
effect:
Inflict _Fragile_ on an adjacent _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ that does not already have _Fragile_, then choose one:
*  If you have 1 or less _Stone Armor_, gain _Stone Armor_ 1.
* Increase the _Durability_ of your _Stone Armor_ by 1 this _Round_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: You may use the first option regardless of the amount of _Stone Armor_ you have.

name: Fracture
desc: An obstacle within range detonates, sending a blast of stone shrapnel shredding through nearby enemies.
effect: Choose a Size 1 _Earthen_ Obstacle within Range. Attack with this Technique's Profile in an Area centered on the Target, then Destroy the Target. On a _Graze_+ deal X additional Damage, where X is half the Speed of the Obstacle. You may make the Area _Veiled_ for 2 Phases.
special: Deal an additional 1 additional Damage on a _Graze_+ if this Technique is used with a _Boulder_ or _Large Boulder_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_/_Grit_: You may choose a Size 2 _Earthen_ Obstacle. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1, and Area is Burst 2.

name: Gilgamesh Swing
desc: You swing an obstacle about, dealing heavy damage.
effect: Target a Size 1 Obstacle with a Height of 1. Inflict _Push_ 2, _Prone_, and Damage equal to the Speed of the Obstacle (2 _Grit_/_Reflex_) in a _Burst_ 1 around you. If a Target negates with _Grit_, still inflict half Damage. If they _Negate_ with _Reflex_ they take no Damage, but are still _Pushed_. If the total damage dealt by this Technique (added up between all Targets) is greater than the _Obstacle's_ _Durability_, Destroy it. Otherwise, inflict _Fragile_ on it.
boost: 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, target a Size 1 Obstacle with a Height of 2. Instead Attack in a Burst 2.

name: Gouging Strike
desc: You make a vicious strike with a spear, wounding a foe.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Lance Weapon.
effect: Add _Wounded_ 1 and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. If the creature is already _Wounded_, deal additional Damage equal to their topmost _Wounded_ Token.

name: Heavy Blow
desc: You strike true, focusing more on immediate damage than setting up another strike.
reqs: Technique allows making an Attack with an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: Inflict no _Vulnerable_ with _Unarmed_ Attacks. Instead, deal additional Damage equal to the _Vulnerable_ that would be inflicted + 1.

name: Herculean Throw
desc: With titanic strength you redecorate with deadly intent.
effect: You must Target a Size 1 _Obstacle_. Instead of using its normal _Interact_, move the Obstacle up to 4 spaces, then Attack a creature next to the Obstacle's final location using the _Heavy Improvised Weapon_ Profile. Add _Fragile_ to the _Obstacle_.
special: If the Target is at a lower Elevation than the Obstacle originally was you have _Advantage_ on this Attack.
boost: 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, Attack in a Burst 1 around the end location of the Obstacle and _Destroy_ it.

name: Invisible Throw
desc: Your thrown weapons come out at blinding speed, catching slower foes fully off-guard.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Thrown_ Weapon.
effect: If the Target has not taken a _Turn_ yet this _Round_, deal an additional 2 Damage on a _Hit_+.

name: Leap
desc: You leap forward, hurdling over hazards and other dangers.
reqs: Technique has Movement.
effect: You may make a single _Jump_ this Turn.

name: Liquid Earth
desc: You run forward, turning earth to fluid as you dart through it.
reqs: Technique has _Movement_.
effect: For this _Movement_, you may ignore all effects of _Earthen_ Terrain. Additionally, you may move through _Earthen_ _Obstacles_, but treat them as _Rough_ Terrain. You may not end your turn inside an _Obstacle_.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: You may move through all _Obstacles_ on _Earthen_ Terrain, but still treat them as _Rough_. While moving on _Earthen_ Terrain, add _Safe_ 2.

name: Long Draw
desc: You set your feet, focusing more on power than mobility.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Projectile Weapon.
effect: This Technique no longer has Movement. Deal +1 Damage on a _Hit_+.

name: Lunging Strike
desc: You dash your grip back on your spear, extending your reach.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Lance Weapon.
effect: Increase your _Reach_ by 1 this _Turn_. Deal additional Damage equal to half the distance between you and the Target.
special: You may gain _Vulnerable_ 2 to instead increase your _Reach_ by 2.

name: Maneuvering Thrust
desc: You use a spear strike to slip away from a foe, or grant an ally the same opportunity.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a Lance Weapon and you are using _Harrier Style_.
effect: After resolving this Attack, you may take a _Step_ Movement. You must end this Movement as far from all Targets as possible. On a _Hit_+, add _Safe_ 1.
special: Instead, after resolving this Attack, an ally adjacent to the Target may pay 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_ to _Step_ Move. Add _Safe_ 1 to this Movement on a _Hit_+.

name: Mighty Leap
desc: You draw upon the earth's strength, massively increasing your jumping power.
reqs: Technique has Movement.
effect: Increase your _Jump_ value by 2 this Turn. You may make a single _Jump_ this turn, and may make the space you start your _Jump_ from _Veiled_ until the end of the next _Phase_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Increase your _Jump_ by an additional 1.

name: Mighty Strike
desc: You strike with unparalled strength, driving back a foe.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Weapon and you are using _Mighty Stance_.
effect: On a _Graze_+, deal +1 Damage, add _Push_ 2, and increase the cost to Negate by 1.
special: If the Weapon is _Heavy_, instead deal +2 Damage, add _Push_ 3, and increase the cost to Negate by 1.

name: Mobile Armor
desc: You are an expert at shifting your posture from mobility to defense.
effect:
Choose one:
* Decrease the _Speed_ of the _Technique_ by 1, but gain _Vulnerable_ 1.
* Increase the _Speed_ of the _Technique_ by 1, but add _Warding_ 2.

name: Mobile Bunker
desc: You run forward with your shield up, providing an ample defense.
reqs: Technique has _Movement_.
effect: You have _Cover_ and +1 _Guard_ this _Turn_.

name: Nimble Blade
desc: Your blade flashes out, providing you the path to retreat.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Blade Weapon with Movement.
effect: On a _Hit_+ with your Blade Weapon add _Safe_ 2. This _Safe_ applies only to the Targets of the Strike.
special: You may take an additional _Step_ Movement, but it must be used after making your Attack.

name: Parkour
desc: You use terrain to accelerate yourself, moving faster all the while.
reqs: Technique has Movement.
effect: You may use the Effect of _Free Run_ a single time this _Turn_ and benefit from its Special.

name: Patient Arts
desc: Your unarmed strikes are slow and calculating, exploiting a foe's openings.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using an _Unarmed_ Weapon_ and you are using _Patient Palm Style_.
effect: Increase the _Speed_ of the Technique by 1. For all _Unarmed_ Attacks, increase the _Cost_ to _Negate_ by 1 and add _Vulnerable_/_Impaired_ 1.
special: The Keywords only apply to _Unarmed_ Attacks made as a part of this Technique.

name: Quick Arts
desc: Your unarmed attacks come forth at blinding speed, striking before foes have the chance to react.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using an _Unarmed_ Weapon_ and you are using _Flying Fist Style_.
effect: Decrease the _Speed_ of the Technique by 1.
special: The Keywords only apply to _Unarmed_ Attacks made as a part of this Technique.

name: Quick Strike
desc: A nimble attack, sacrificing power for speed.
reqs: Technique is a Strike.
effect: Decrease the _Speed_ of the Technique by 1. Deal -2 Damage if _Versatile_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Add _Sure Hit_ 1.

name: Rapid Shot
desc: You quickly fire, sacrificing power for speed.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Projectile Weapon.
effect: Make three Attacks using your Weapon's Profile against the same Target. If all three are a _Hit_+, inflict _Wounded_ 1 (2 _Grit_).

name: Rebalancing Strike
desc: You readjust your stance on the fly, preparing for a different assault.
reqs: Technique allows making an Attack with an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: Change your _Stance_/_Style_.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Instead, clear _Staggered_ then change your _Stance_/_Style_.

name: Rending Slash
desc: A specialized blade technique that punishes unarmored foes.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Blade Weapon.
effect: If the Target has no _Guard_ or you target a Creature Part, either deal 2 additional Damage or inflict _Bleed_1x3.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: On a _Hit_+, add _Wounded_ 1 and increase the _Cost_ to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Rouse
desc: Your courage fills you with the strength to carry on.
reqs: You are using _Defiant Stance_.
effect: At the end of your _Turn_, remove your topmost _Courage_ Token. Gain _Grit_ equal to its value or _Vigor_ equal to twice its value.

name: Sample Enhancement
desc: A sample Enhancement to outline the different fields.
cost: What must be paid to use this Enhancement.
reqs: What requirements you must fulfill to use this Enhancement.
effect: The primary effect of this Enhancement.
special: The secondary effect of this Enhancement.
boost: An optional effect with an associated cost that can be paid when the Technique this Enhancement was used on is used.

name: Sapping Strike
desc: Your weapon erode's a foe's ability to defend themself with every strike.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Blunt_ Weapon.
effect: On a _Hit_, you may force the Target to discard 1 _Defensive Token_ of your choice. On a _Crit_,  they instead discard 2. If they do not have sufficient Defensive Tokens they may discard other _Defensive Tokens_ of their choice. If they have no other _Defensive Tokens_, they instead take Damage equal to twice the Tokens they did not discard.

name: Seismic Aim
desc: You set your feet as you strike, reading your foe's every move.
reqs: _Attached_ to a Single-Target Strike.
effect: Ignore _Veiled_ Terrain for this Technique. If the Target is within your _Seismic Sense_, reduce any _Penalty_ by 1 and ignore _Cover_.
special: If the Target is within your _Seismic Sense_, you may remove the target's Topmost _Knowledge_ Token. Add _Pierce_ X-1/_Unblockable_ X/_Sure Hit_ X, where X is the Value of the Token.
boost: 1 _Focus_/_Momentum_: Instead of reducing any _Penalty_, ignore _Disadvantage_.

name: Severing Strike
desc: You outmaneuver a foe in an attempt to break their stance.
reqs: Technique allows making an Attack with an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: Once this _Turn_, on a _Hit_+ with an _Unarmed_ Weapon, add _Staggered_ and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.

name: Skirmisher's Charge
desc: You slip along the battlefield, unable to be pinned down.
reqs: Technique has _Movement_.
effect: You may immediately Attack the first enemy to use an _Opportune_ _Punish_ _Reaction_ against you with a 1 AP Single-Target _Strike_, paying all Costs as normal.

name: Sledge
desc: Your weapon tears through an obstacle, surprising a foe.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a Blunt Weapon_.
effect: Once this _Turn_, before making an Attack with your Blunt Weapon, attack an _Obstacle_ adjacent to the _Target_ with your Blunt Weapon. If you _Destroy_ the _Obstacle_, gain a +1 Bonus to your _Attack Roll_. If you do not _Destroy_ it, instead take a -1 Penalty.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Deal +2 Damage to the Obstacle. You may repeat this _Boost_.

name: Sling Stone
desc: Your spirit assists you in flinging a stone with massive force.
effect: You must target a _Boulder_ or _Large Boulder_. Range is instead 6 and, if you use the Obstacle's Interact, halve all Costs.
boost:
Choose one, and use it in place of one of the Obstacle's Interact:
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Must target a _Boulder_. Use either of the _Boulder_'s Interacts at no Cost, but instead _Push_ it 6 spaces. Deal +1 Damage and increase the _Push_ it inflicts by 2.
* 3 _Grit_/_Momentum_: As above, but instead target a _Large Boulder_.

name: Spacing Strike
desc: You briefly utilize your ranged weapon as a melee one.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a Projectile Weapon and you are using _Close-Quarters Style_.
effect: Before resolving any part of your _Technique_, Attack with a Light, Medium or Heavy Improvised Weapon, depending on if the Weapon is Light, Versatile or Heavy. Add _Push_ 1, and increase the cost to Negate by 1. Resolve the actual _Technique_, but add _Glancing_.

name: Spear Vault
desc: You plant your spear, using it as a pole vault to amplify your jump.
reqs: Technique has Movement and you are Wielding a Lance Weapon.
effect: Increase your _Jump_ value by 1 + your Lance Weapon's _Reach_ this Turn for the first _Jump_ you make this Turn.

name: Spire Strike
desc: Your pull the earth up into jagged spikes.
effect: Make an unoccupied _Earthen_ space in Range 6 _Jagged_. Inflict _Bleed_ 1 on an adjacent creature (1 _Reflex_).
boost: 1 _Grit_: Instead, inflict _Hobbled_ 1 (2 _Reflex_).

name: Staggering Strike
desc: A heavy blow that is almost certain to delay a foe.
reqs: Technique allows making an Attack with an _Unarmed_ Weapon.
effect: Once this _Turn_, on a _Hit_+ with an _Unarmed_ Weapon, add _Slowed_, _Push_ 2, and increase the cost to Negate by 1.

name: Stone Eruption
desc: You run headlong into stone, detonating it with explosive force and charge forward in the stonescreen.
reqs: Technique has _Movement_ and you are using _Rubble Stance_.
effect: Once this _Movement_ you may deal 10 _Crush_ Damage to an _Earthen_ Obstacle. If you _Destroy_ it you may immediately _Step_ Move in any direction and deal 2 _Slash_ Damage to all adjacent creatures, excluding yourself. For the remainder of your _Turn_, other creatures treat you as _Veiled_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Deal 4 additional Damage to the Obstacle.

name: Strong Strike
desc: A powerful blow, sacrificing speed for power.
reqs: Technique is a Strike.
effect: Increase the _Speed_ of the Technique by 1. Deal an additional 2 Damage if _Versatile_, or 3 if _Heavy_.
special: If the Technique targets multiple creatures, instead deal 1/2 additional Damage with _Versatile_/_Heavy_ Weapons.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Add _Unblockable_ 1.

name: Sundering Strike
desc: Your blow against a foe's defenses reverberates through them.
reqs: Technique is a Strike using a _Blunt_ Weapon.
effect: If this Attack targets a creature's _Armor_, inflict _Dazed_ 2/_Exposed_ 1 (2 _Focus_) on the creature on a _Hit_+.

name: Tumble
desc: You roll across the ground, slipping past foes.
reqs: Technique has Movement and you are using _Tumbler Style_.
effect: At any point in your Movement, you may declare that you are Tumbling. For the next X spaces, where X is your _Step_ value, add _Charge_, _Rush_, and _Safe_ 2 to your Movement.

name: Vault
desc: You make a mighty leap, covering more ground than most.
reqs: Technique has Movement and wearing Light or No _Armor_.
effect: You may _Jump_ this Turn. Increase your _Jump_ value by 1 this Turn.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add _Feint_ to the Attached Technique. If you _Jump_ through a creature's space this turn they must _Negate_ with 2 _Reflex_ or else you have _Advantage_ on any Attack Roll against them this turn.

name: Warding Blade
desc: You sacrifice the power of your strike to slip into a defensive stance, preparing for the opponent's next blow.
reqs: Technique is a _Strike_ using a Blade Weapon.
effect: Reduce the Damage of the Strike by 2, to a minimum of 1. Gain 1 _Grit_/_Reflex_ on a _Crit_.
special:
Gain an additional bonus, depending on the Strike's Keywords:
* _Quick_: Gain 1 _Reflex_. If the Weapon is _Light_, add _Safe_ 1.
* _Strong_: _Gain 1 _Grit_. Instead, only reduce the Damage by 1. If the Weapon is _Heavy_, instead do not reduce the Damage.
* Other: This Technique instead has _Warding_ 2. Gain 1 _Grit_/_Reflex_.
